manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Premium Memory foam Pressure Relief Seat Cushion Memory foam uses your body heat to adapt and contour to fit your precise shape. This ergonomic chair cushion takes into account the amount of weight applied and provides support where you need it most. With twice Lengthened in “U” than the normal chair cushion,Hxlmn butt cushion for office chair provides maximum support and comfort while reducing pressure on the coccyx/tailbone and promotes healthy posture,
Lengthened ergonomic "U" shaped cut out,improve the ventilation, keep feeling cool & comfortable.

Larger butt cushion provides maximum support and comfort HxLmn U-CUTOUT seat cushion:18"x 16"x 3" Others U-CUTOUT seat cushion:17.5" x13.5"x3" our seat cushion is larger,which provides maximum support and comfort,better air circulation.Please check our product dimensions to ensure the size fits your needs.

Designed for Ultimate Comfort The all in-one features engineered into this desk chair cushion are unrivaled.Ergonomically designed for pain relief and ultimate comfortt,he contour design hugs your curves and provides superior support.Advanced heat responsive technology conforms to your body to create the optimal support and comfort level. Breathable Cover for Ample Airflow Our office chair seat pad features a breathable mesh cover that allow air to flow throughout,so you can sit comfortably and cool Removable & Washable Cover Our durable zippered cover is soft on the skin and machine washable for easy cleaning. We designed it easy to care so that you can sit back and relax more on your tailbone cushion for tailbone pain relief.Memory foam is protected with 2 layers covers, to protect it intact and no get dirty for your long-term daily use. Non-slip Bottom Designed with your ultimate comfort in mind, our coccyx pillow is studded with a premium rubber texture to ensure minimal to no movement.

Turn Any Chair into A Premium Seat Transform any chair into a premium seat with the Upgraded Lengthened U-shape Cutout pillow for tailbone pain ! Great for home, office chair, desk chair, car seat, wheelchair and anywhere you sit. Working from home or studying will be more comfortable than ever with HxLmn ergonomic chair cushion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped me immensely!
reviews.reviewText: Oh my word, this has been a life-saver for me. I've tried 4 brands to help relieve my painful sciatica, and although they were all okay, this one has been the best by far -- firm enough but not too hard and with a comfortable front edge that doesn't bite into my legs. I've actually bought a second one so I don't have to keep moving it from room to room. I have one on my computer chair at the moment and it's so comfy, yet sturdy. My tailbone doesn't get sore at all any more when I'm sitting. The extra long cut-out helps a lot since I'm kind of "squirmy" when I sit. Yes, there will be a bit of that "foam smell" at first -- every single brand I've tried plus my mattress topper had it. Just unpackage it and stick it in a spare room for a few days before using. It's worth the wait to relieve your pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great way to heal from and prevent tailbone injury
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this because I hurt my tailbone it was too painful to sit without it. I've continued to use after recovery because it makes sitting much more comfortable. The grippy bottom keeps it in place and it hasn't lost any cushioning. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works very well to alleviate pain
reviews.reviewText: I sit all day at a computer. I suffer from tailbone pain. I used a doughnut and Cushion Lab cushion seat. Both didn’t alleviate the pain. I tried this because the cutoff is longer so you are not putting pressure on the tailbone. I can sit most of the day without having to suffer too much. I wish it was thicker but it does the job. I recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this seat cushion. I use it in my car as well as on the job. It's easy on the tailbone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My mother has not had a pressure sore since I got her this pillow.But it does not come with straps, like it shows in the picture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not keep firmness
reviews.reviewText: Not overly impressed with this cushion. It was fairly soft straight out of the package. Was needing something more sturdy for a butt sore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have Interstitial cystitis. Sitting at a computer all day at work made the pain unbearable. This item reduced the pressure where I needed it. The color blends in with the design of my chair. I have had so much less pain now that I have this cushion. I highly recommend it to anyone with this problem. I believe would work well for men with prostate difficulty too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is a lifesaver for tailbone pain. I bought a different one prior to this, and because it was very thick, and shorter in length, it caused secondary pain to my rear end and the bottom of my thighs. But not this cushion. The thickness and length are perfect. I am buying a second one so that I don't have to continuously move the one I have from the car to the home/office.

Le model que j'ai reçu, ne correspond pas tout à fait à la photo, il n'y a pas de sangle et le tissus du dessus est un peu différent, toutefois la confection est bonne. Il n'y a pas très longtemps que je l'ai et il s'est affaissé un peu pourtant je pèse que 120 lbs. Je ne regrette pas trop cet achat, mais j'ai l'impression qu'il ne répondera pas a mes besoins bien longtemps.
